entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the main character in this conversation, a student who is trying to figure out how to defeat the boggart. He is described as looking around wildly and whispering 'Professor Snape'.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a teacher at Hogwarts who is helping Neville with the boggart. He is described as being cheerful and thoughtful.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned by Neville in his whisper. He is not physically present in this conversation.

entities.name: neville's grandmother
entities.description: Neville's grandmother is someone he lives with and is afraid of the boggart turning into her. She is described as wearing a tall hat with a stuffed vulture on top, a long green dress, and sometimes a fox-fur scarf.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin is helping Neville with the boggart. He asks Neville questions to help him figure out how to defeat it.
Neville lives with his grandmother, which is why he is afraid of the boggart turning into her.
